author: MartinGC94
body:
## Summary of the new feature/enhancement
Some of the tooltips used for tab completion are stored as simple strings instead of using string resources that can be localized. This should be changed.

The following is a list of places where I know it's a problem, but we should look through the rest of the completion code as well:

- The "Requires"  statement completion
- The Help keyword completion (not yet implemented, but will be after: https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/pull/15337 )
title: Use resources instead of hard coded strings for tab completion tooltip text
